Title: Human Liver Microsomal Stability
Description: The Human Liver Microsomal assay takes into account the liver-mediated drug metabolism to assess the stability of a compound in the human body. The NIH-NCATS group took a proprietary dataset of 4300 compounds with its associated HLM (in vitro half-life; unstable ≤  30 min, stable >30 min) and used it to train a classifier.
Interpretation: Probability of a compound being unstable in a HLM assay (half-life ≤ 30min)
